data.why:
A simple suite of 2D animation generating Perl scripts that
    manipulate images through the NetPBM and ImageMagick toolkits to
    produce a series of frames that can then be joined to form an
    uncompressed AVI using animmaker.

    See http://obdwww.egyptus.co.uk/perlanim/ for more details.

    See http://www.ysrnry.co.uk/tvprog/ to see what I'm using it for.
